PullRequestIsStale.Name: PullRequestIsStale
PullRequestIsStale.Value: {0} - This pull request is stale and may be abandoned soon if you don't do something.
PullRequestIsStale.Description: The message that is written by BroomBot as a comment on a stale pull request. Use {0} tag the creator of the pull request.

BroomBotName.Name: BroomBotName
BroomBotName.Description: The Author.Id/UPN property of the service account running BroomBot.

WarningPrefix.Name: WarningPrefix
WarningPrefix.Description: A prefix on the tags BroomBot applies to stale pull requests.

StaleAge.Name: StaleAge
StaleAge.Description: The number of hours a pull request can go without any activity before the pull request is considered stale.

WarningCount.Name: WarningCount
WarningCount.Description: How many warnings are given to a pull request creator before the pull request is abandoned.
